Text.Page:
The orcan attacks kept us from making our regular supply runs to Godric's Farm. Thanks to you, we can probably start them back up.

Take these supplies to {@LinkCreature:207#1005#Heroth}. He's shepherding the last farmers in the region and babysitting some Mysterium hotshots. These supplies should be a welcome shot to his morale.

Rations? Actual rations? Not dried rat or weeds a goat trampled weeks ago? I'm impressed!

I knew Drustan wouldn't forget us out here. He's a good officerâ€”watches out for his troops. Appreciate you coming through with these, . My soldiers could use them.
